body:
Hello,

With staff applications opening up i would like to know what the requirements are so i can prepare.  Thank you

-Tarheelkiwi
body_tagged:

title: Staff requirements

replies.body: As far as I know the only requirements are that you have a mic and can use skype/Teamspeak. The usual be mature, active etc. apply also I would assume.
replies.body_tagged: As far as I know the only requirements are that you have a mic and can use skype/Teamspeak. The usual be mature, active etc. apply also I would assume.
